Summary: Saw a light thought was star, then moving, thought aircraft, no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette, looking at the sky, noticed a light,bright star, then noticed it was moving, coming from sse, thought aircraft landing lights, no strobes, no sound, came closer and much brighter, aprox. 5 hand widths above horizon turned E. and from a bright light gradually out of sight, never any sound or strobes,sighting lasted 3 to 4 minutes, moon had not risen,
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Whitney
There were no other sightings in Whitney on or around May 20th 2008
